channel.title: Server
channel.description: So i have went through all the port forwardin and stuff and no-ip and it i still cant connect to my server...any suggestions?

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

  1. check the no-ip your trying to host.
  2. make sure 43594-43594 is in the linksys (or whatever your using)
  3. if you really want to… use “localhost” or… 127.0.0.1 to edit your server, but others can’t connect.

that’s all i would know of…
